style: plain Hindi summary, sirf important clauses, numbering mention but nested details optional

output.original:
SOFTWARE LICENSE AND DATA PROCESSING AGREEMENT
Last updated: 01 January 2025

THIS SOFTWARE LICENSE AND DATA PROCESSING AGREEMENT ("Agreement") is entered into between:

(1) ABC TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED, a company incorporated under the laws of India, having its registered office at New Delhi ("Licensor"); and
(2) XYZ ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED, a company incorporated under the laws of India, having its registered office at Bengaluru ("Licensee").

1. DEFINITIONS
1.1 "Confidential Information" means any non-public information disclosed by one Party to the other Party, whether orally or in writing, that is designated as confidential or should reasonably be understood to be confidential.
1.2 "Personal Data", "Controller", "Processor" and "Processing" shall have the meanings given under applicable data protection laws.
1.3 "Software" means the object code version of the ABC Data Insights Platform.

2. LICENSE GRANT
2.1 Subject to Licensee's compliance with this Agreement and payment of all applicable fees, Licensor grants to Licensee a non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to install and use the Software.
2.2 Licensee shall not: (a) copy, modify or create derivative works; (b) reverse engineer or decompile; (c) rent, lease, sublicense or distribute the Software.

3. FEES AND PAYMENT TERMS
3.1 Licensee shall pay to Licensor the license fees set out in the applicable order form.
3.2 All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes and non-refundable except as expressly provided.
3.3 If Licensee fails to make payment when due, Licensor may charge interest at 1.5% per month or suspend access.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY
4.1 Each Party shall keep Confidential Information strictly confidential and not disclose it to third parties without prior written consent.
4.2 Confidentiality obligations shall not apply to information that is publicly available or independently developed.

5. DATA PROCESSING
5.1 Licensor Processes Personal Data on behalf of Licensee, where Licensee acts as Controller and Licensor as Processor.
5.2 Licensor shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect Personal Data against unauthorised access or loss.

6. SECURITY INCIDENTS
6.1 Licensor shall notify Licensee without undue delay after becoming aware of a Personal Data breach.
6.2 Notice shall include the nature of breach, categories of data subjects, and measures taken.

7. TERMINATION
7.1 This Agreement shall continue until terminated in accordance with this clause.
7.2 Either Party may terminate with thirty (30) days' written notice for material breach not remedied within such period.
7.3 Upon termination, all licences cease and Licensee shall return the Software and Confidential Information.

8. GOVERNING LAW
8.1 This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India.
8.2 The courts of New Delhi, India shall have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Agreement on the Effective Date.

Licensor: ABC TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
Authorized Signatory: ______________________

Licensee: XYZ ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
Authorized Signatory: ______________________
output.simplified: The Parties hereto have entered into an agreement relating to the use of the software and data processing platform (the "Software"), which is subject to the terms of this agreement. Both Parties agree that: (1) Licensor will maintain the Software strictly confidential; (2) Licensee will not disclose the Software to any third party without prior consent; (3) Licensor's performance of its obligations under this agreement shall be limited to the duration of the applicable licence period; and (4) Licensor has no control over the Software or Personal Data.
